Web Service Call Status: Failed due to bad request. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating a bad client request.

AppAlarm.message: Web Service Call Status: Failed due to bad user credentials. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Access denied due to bad login id or password.
AppAlarm.solution: Check if the Caps lock is on in your keyboard and usage of Upper Case and Lower Case letter in login credentials.

AppAlarm.message: Web Service Call Status: Failed! Payment Required. Status=%s
AppAlarm.diag: This is a paid service. Your payment process failed to complete the request.

AppAlarm.message: Web Service Call Status: Failed due to unauthorized resource. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating that an access to a resource requested by a client has been forbidden by the server.

AppAlarm.message: Web Service Call Status: Failed! Method not allowed. %s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating a resource requested by a client was not found on the server.

AppAlarm.message: Web Service Call Status: Failed! Too many requests. %s
Web Service Call Status: Failed! Invalid Protocol. %s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating a resource requested by a client using an Invalid Protocol.

Domain Service Call completed : %s Time Taken = %s
Domain Service Call Success! : Class Name=%s | Method Name=%s
Domain Service Call: Request accepted for processing..
Domain Service Call Failed! Bad Request = %s
Domain Service Call Failed! Internal Server Error = %s
Domain Service Call Failed! Service unavailable = %s

Domain Service Call Failed! Business Process Interrupted = %s

Repository Service Call initiated : %s
Repository Service Call initiated : %s
Repository Service Call initiated : %s
Repository Service Call completed : %s Time Taken = %s
Repository Service Call Success! : Class Name=%s | Method Name=%s
Repository Tx Exception: Entity Found! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: If the entity already exists, the EntityExistsException may be thrown when the persist operation is invoked, or the EntityExistsException or another PersistenceException may be thrown at flush or commit time.
AppAlarm.solution: Duplicate Entity Found. Check the Unique Keys

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Entity Not Found! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Entity Not Found. Either Primary Key is invalid or the Entity Active Status is set as false (marked as deleted).
AppAlarm.solution: Entity Not Found. Check if the Entity is marked as Deleted or the query condition to retrieve this entity.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Lock Timeout! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an pessimistic locking conflict occurs that does not result in transaction rollback. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, at, flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be not be marked for rollback.
AppAlarm.solution: Please try after some time.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Non Unique Result! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when Query.getSingleResult() or TypedQuery.getSingleResult() is executed on a query and there is more than one result from the query. This exception will not cause the current transaction, if one is active, to be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: No Result! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when Query.getSingleResult() or TypedQuery.getSingleResult()is executed on a query and there is no result to return. This exception will not cause the current transaction, if one is active, to be marked for rollback.
AppAlarm.solution: No Data Found. Check the Query Criteria.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Optimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an optimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Pessimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an pessimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Query Timeout! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a query times out and only the statement is rolled back. The current transaction, if one is active, will be not be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Rollback! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when commit() method call fails.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Transaction Required! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a transaction is required but is not active.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: No Result! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when Query.getSingleResult() or TypedQuery.getSingleResult()is executed on a query and there is no result to return. This exception will not cause the current transaction, if one is active, to be marked for rollback.
AppAlarm.solution: No Data Found. Check the Query Criteria.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Optimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an optimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Pessimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an pessimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Query Timeout! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a query times out and only the statement is rolled back. The current transaction, if one is active, will be not be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Rollback! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when commit() method call fails.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Transaction Required! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a transaction is required but is not active.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Service Call Data Validation Failed! Reason=%s
Repository Service Call Save Failed! Reason=%s
Repository Service Call Update Failed! Reason=%s
Repository Service Call Delete Failed! Reason=%s
Data Source Connection Failed! Reason=%s
External Service Call initiated : %s
External Service Call completed : %s Time Taken = %s
External Service Call Status: Success! Class Name=% | Method Name=%s
External Service Call Status: Success! Class Name=% | Method Name=%s
External Service Call Status: Failed due to bad request. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating a bad client request.

AppAlarm.message: External Service Call Status: Failed due to bad user credentials. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Access denied due to bad login id or password.
AppAlarm.solution: Check if the Caps lock is on in your keyboard and usage of Upper Case and Lower Case letter in login credentials.

AppAlarm.message: External Service Call Status: Failed! Payment Required. Status=%s
AppAlarm.diag: This is a paid service. Your payment process failed to complete the request.

AppAlarm.message: External Service Call Status: Failed due to unauthorized resource. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating that an access to a resource requested by a client has been forbidden by the server.

AppAlarm.message: External Service Call Status: Failed! Method not allowed. Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: A runtime exception indicating a resource requested by a client was not found on the server.

AppAlarm.message: External Service Call Status: Failed! Too many requests. Reason=%s
External Service Call Status: Failed! Invalid Input Params. Reason=%s
External Service Call Status: Failed! Invalid Data returned. Reason=%s
External Service Connection Failed! Reason=%s

Repository Tx Exception: Entity Found! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: If the entity already exists, the EntityExistsException may be thrown when the persist operation is invoked, or the EntityExistsException or another PersistenceException may be thrown at flush or commit time.
AppAlarm.solution: Duplicate Entity Found. Check the Unique Keys

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Entity Not Found! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Entity Not Found. Either Primary Key is invalid or the Entity Active Status is set as false (marked as deleted).
AppAlarm.solution: Entity Not Found. Check if the Entity is marked as Deleted or the query condition to retrieve this entity.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Lock Timeout! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an pessimistic locking conflict occurs that does not result in transaction rollback. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, at, flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be not be marked for rollback.
AppAlarm.solution: Please try after some time.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Non Unique Result! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when Query.getSingleResult() or TypedQuery.getSingleResult() is executed on a query and there is more than one result from the query. This exception will not cause the current transaction, if one is active, to be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: No Result! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when Query.getSingleResult() or TypedQuery.getSingleResult()is executed on a query and there is no result to return. This exception will not cause the current transaction, if one is active, to be marked for rollback.
AppAlarm.solution: No Data Found. Check the Query Criteria.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Optimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an optimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Pessimistic Lock! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when an pessimistic locking conflict occurs. This exception may be thrown as part of an API call, a flush or at commit time. The current transaction, if one is active, will be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Query Timeout! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a query times out and only the statement is rolled back. The current transaction, if one is active, will be not be marked for rollback.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Rollback! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when commit() method call fails.

AppAlarm.message: Repository Tx Exception: Transaction Required! Reason=%s
AppAlarm.diag: Thrown by the persistence provider when a transaction is required but is not active.
